Okay, please hand me all of your ability scrolls,

Ah yes, since you guys probably won't be leaving
this facility a lot,\. might as well help
exterminate some monsters with the local militia.\!
There are areas 1 through 10, ranging from easiest
to hardest.\. Complete the missions and we'll give you
some gold to help you with your final mission.\!
Feel free to use any services provided in the facility.\.
Well, maybe except for the agent rooms.\!
I guess not entirely, but you can't enter an agent
room if the corresponding agent isn't in your party.\.
For example you can't enter the Oracle room without
Just house rules.\. I have no say about it because
we need to sit here for two weeks before
last person I want to hear that from.\!
with the place first.\. Are we all done
Here, you will have 14 in-game days to spend until
your group takes on the final boss.\. Use the
Twincasle's facilities to prepare adequately for
Just like real life, you could only do so much in a day.\.
Thus, you are only given 3 AP (action points) every
day. When all of your AP is gone, \C[2]the game will
go into nighttime and the day will pass.\!
Please advise that some activities (such as missions)
consumes 2 AP at a time, so manage your actions
Optional story battles will happen on certain days..
or nights. And they can be difficult regardless of
your preparation.\! But winning them gives bountiful
rewards ..and a step closer to the truth.\!
There are mandatory story battles, though. And failing
these battles would result in a game over.\!
Maybe you'll find a way to make these fights a little
easier, or maybe even make it a cinch.\!

If a character is K.O'd when you finish an area,
that character won't be able to join your party
Exception to this rule is if a character is only
available to use for one day, after which the player
might attempt to make said character join the party
Do be careful since some events might require
certain characters to be in your party.\!
That being said, the character will be available
again for the following day. Good luck!\!

Granted, you probably won't have much

Oh and don't forget to bring some food

After defeating a wave of monster in an area, you
will be transferred into a rest area where you can
decide to go for a second round or end the day.\!
This rest area can be used to heal your party
members.\. If a party member is still K.O'd by the end
of a mission, you will not be able to use them for a
If you decide to work overtime, you will fight the
same round of monsters again one more time. Of course,
the payment will also be increased.\!
You will also need to bring meal sets or feasts if you
decide to do overtime. These can be bought in the
You need to bring a meal set for each member of your
party or just 1 feast to feed all of them.\!
If you did not feed a party member and decide to do
overtime, that party member might not be available
Remember that potions can only be used in battles
and foods can only be use outside of battles.\!
Understood. Enjoy the rest of your day.\!
Well we're all here at last.\!
Unfortunately, we cant have other agents
assist us for our final mission.\!
Any last thoughts before we depart?\!

To bring an end to all strife in the world.\!

Whichever path life might take us; were
all heading towards the same destination.\!
